title: Ullathila Nalla Ullam Lyrics Karnan
stanzas:
thaaiku nee magan illai
thambikku annan illai (2)
oor pazhi yaetraayadaa
naanum unpali kondenadaa
naanum unpali kondenadaa

mannavar pani yaerkkum
kannanum pani seiyya
unnadi panivaanadaa
karnaa mannithu arulvaayadaa

senjotru kadan theerkka
seraadha idam serndhu
vanjathil veezhnthaayada
karnaa vanjagan kannanadaa
karnaa vanjagan kannanadaa
